university.name: Università degli Studi di Milano
university.notes: 160 degree programs: 82 triennali/ciclo unico, 78 magistrali. 36 PhDs, 60 masters. 10 faculties/schools. Nearly half of students pay no tuition due to expanded no tax area (€30,000).

admissions.notes: 10 schools: Studi Umanistici, Scienze, Medicina e Chirurgia, Giurisprudenza, etc. Medicine: semestre filtro (no initial test).

tuition.notes: No Tax Area - only first rate
Based on ISEE and field (humanities €3,360 / sciences €4,257)

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: First rate €156 at enrollment. Second rate mid-December, due Jan 31, 2026. Installments available for second rate ≥€700.
tuition.notes: No tax area expanded to €30,000 (from €22,000). ISEE max raised to €80,000. Nearly half of students pay no tuition.

scholarships.description: Regional scholarship covering tuition, accommodation, meals
